text: Berend Pieter "Bé" Jansema (24 January 1943 – 14 February 2021) was a Dutch civil servant and politician. He was a member of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy. He was an alderman of Houten from 1979 until 1981 and mayor of Rossum and Heerewaarden from 1981 until 1989. He later was mayor of Harlingen from 1989 until 1997 and of Coevorden from 1998 until 2003. Jansema was born in Wagenborgen (Eemsdelta) and died in Maspalomas, Gran Canaria on 14 February 2021, aged 78. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Dutch civil servants Category:Dutch councillors Category:Dutch mayors Category:People's Party for Freedom and Democracy politicians Category:Politicians from Groningen (province)
title: Berend Jansema
